patthana8.2:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ
patthana8.2:1.1_1: uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo
patthana8.2:1.1_2: mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana8.2:1.1_3: rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.2:1.1_4: hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana8.2:1.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
patthana8.2:1.1_6: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:2.1: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:3.1_0: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana8.2:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.2:6.1_0: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo
patthana8.2:6.1_1: naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca
patthana8.2:7.1: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:8.1: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.2:9.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava …pe… sahajāte nava,
patthana8.2:9.1_1: aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme
patthana8.2:9.1_2: …pe… jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava.
